column2: Rumors in a battle spread like a grassfire .
The artist is like a fragment of a mosaic .
She stood up and grasped the chair arms and brought her thin body upright like a bird alert for flight.
It made only a tiny bump over the two men like a tire over a piece of gravel then moved on .
But Chris brightened up like a candle .
He shouted like a hoarse old mastiff , his hair stiff and bristling .
